title: History-Search
description: This web-app(SPA) provides an user interface to search for top 10 related historical events and figures using public APIs

title: Weather-App
description: This web-app(SPA) provides an user interface to view weather at current location and searched location using openweather APIs

title: Pneumonia Detection from Chest X-rays
description: Achieved State of the Art performance (accuracy and recall upto 0.9 and 0.85 respectively) in detecting pneumonia from Chest X-rays using novel SPINALNET
